title: refactoring proposal : composite for Stage and FetchStrategy
body:
Modifications :
- [x] added a class decorator to easily create composite over an interface or a series of methods
- [x] `spack/package.py` : moved complexity from `do_stage` and `do_fetch` to `stage` and `fetch` property
- [x] simplified logic in `mirror.py` (stage and fetcher creation is left to pkg)
- [x] fix the two unit tests that are failing due to the changes in `stage.py` and `fetch_strategy.py`
- [x] unit tests for composite class decorator
- [x] the `resource` directive can now use all available fetchers
- [x] `llvm` can now build the latest `trunk` (`llvm@develop`) as an example of the capability above

Any comment on the code is more than welcome!

@tgamblin : the API of `Stage` and `FetchStrategy` needs to be modified further to avoid exposing the items in the composite after its construction (for instance I would like to avoid the `for` loop in `mirror.py` and the conditional used to construct `name` and `archive_path`). I start a PR early to receive comments on this and see if the changes here fit with what you have in mind for this part of the code.
